name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ABHA Plug-in by Bajaj Finserv Health

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance hospital ops with ABHA Plug-in: manage ABHA appointments, create patient accounts, link records, and get ABDM certified.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Streamline your hospital's registrations & operations with the ABHA Plug-in. Accept ABHA appointments, create ABHA patient accounts, and link their medical records seamlessly. Get ABDM certified and enhance patient care with this essential tool for healthcare providers in India. To know more or get your hospital onboarded reach out to bajajfinservhealth@gmail.com.
